text: Antonio Conte Cavaliere OMRI (born 31 July 1969) is an Italian football manager and former player who was most recently the head coach of Premier League club Tottenham Hotspur. He has played for Italy national team. He has won many titles like the FA Cup, Serie A, and the Premier League with Chelsea and Inter Milan respectively.
